verses.verse: <S%H2896>Better<s%> is the <S%H7326>poor<s%> that <S%H1980>walks<s%> in his <S%H8537>integrity,<s%> than he that is <S%H6141>perverse<s%> in his <S%H8193>lips,<s%> and is a <S%H3684>fool.<s%>

<S%H1571>Also,<s%> that the <S%H5315>soul<s%> be <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> it is not <S%H2896>good;<s%> and he that <S%H213>hastens<s%> with his <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H2398>sins.<s%>
The <S%H200>foolishness<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5557>perverts<s%> his <S%H1870>way:<s%> and his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2196>frets<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
<S%H1952>Wealth<s%> makes <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7453>friends;<s%> but the <S%H1800>poor<s%> is <S%H6504>separated<s%> from his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>
A <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> shall not be <S%H5352>unpunished,<s%> and he that <S%H6315>speaks<s%> <S%H3576>lies<s%> shall not <S%H4422>escape.<s%>
<S%H7227>Many<s%> will <S%H2470>entreat<s%> the <S%H6440>favor<s%> of the <S%H5081>prince:<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> man is a <S%H7453>friend<s%> to him that gives <S%H4976>gifts.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H251>brothers<s%> of the <S%H7326>poor<s%> do <S%H8130>hate<s%> him: <S%H637>how<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> more do his <S%H4828>friends<s%> <S%H7368>go<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from him? he <S%H7291>pursues<s%> them with <S%H561>words,<s%> yet they are <S%H3808>wanting<s%> to him.
He that <S%H7069>gets<s%> <S%H3820>wisdom<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul:<s%> he that <S%H8104>keeps<s%> <S%H8394>understanding<s%> shall <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%>
A <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> shall not be <S%H5352>unpunished,<s%> and he that <S%H6315>speaks<s%> <S%H3576>lies<s%> shall <S%H6>perish.<s%>
<S%H8588>Delight<s%> is not <S%H5000>seemly<s%> for a <S%H3684>fool;<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> less for a <S%H5650>servant<s%> to have <S%H4910>rule<s%> over <S%H8269>princes.<s%>
The <S%H7922>discretion<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H748>defers<s%> his <S%H639>anger;<s%> and it is his <S%H8597>glory<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> a <S%H6588>transgression.<s%>
The <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H2197>wrath<s%> is as the <S%H5099>roaring<s%> of a <S%H3715>lion;<s%> but his <S%H7522>favor<s%> is as <S%H2919>dew<s%> on the <S%H6212>grass.<s%>

A <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> is the <S%H1942>calamity<s%> of his <S%H1>father:<s%> and the <S%H4079>contentions<s%> of a <S%H802>wife<s%> are a <S%H2956>continual<s%> <S%H1812>dropping.<s%>
<S%H1004>House<s%> and <S%H1952>riches<s%> are the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H1>fathers:<s%> and a <S%H7919>prudent<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> is from the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
<S%H6103>Slothfulness<s%> <S%H5307>casts<s%> into a <S%H8639>deep<s%> <S%H3462>sleep;<s%> and an <S%H7423>idle<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall suffer <S%H7456>hunger.<s%>
He that <S%H8104>keeps<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> <S%H8104>keeps<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul;<s%> but he that <S%H959>despises<s%> his <S%H1870>ways<s%> shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>
He that has <S%H2603>pity<s%> on the <S%H1800>poor<s%> <S%H3867>lends<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and that which he has <S%H1576>given<s%> will he <S%H7999>pay<s%> him <S%H7999>again.<s%>
<S%H3256>Chasten<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3588>while<s%> there is <S%H8615>hope,<s%> and let not your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H5375>spare<s%> for his <S%H4191>crying.<s%>
A man of great <S%H2534>wrath<s%> shall <S%H5375>suffer<s%> <S%H6066>punishment:<s%> for <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H5337>deliver<s%> him, <S%H5750>yet<s%> you must do it <S%H3254>again.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> and <S%H6901>receive<s%> <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> that you may be <S%H2449>wise<s%> in your <S%H319>latter<s%> end.
There are <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4284>devices<s%> in a <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H3820>heart;<s%> nevertheless the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that shall <S%H6965>stand.<s%>
The <S%H8378>desire<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> is his <S%H2617>kindness:<s%> and a <S%H7326>poor<s%> man is <S%H2896>better<s%> than a <S%H376>liar.<s%> <S%H3576><s%>

The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> tends to <S%H2416>life:<s%> and he that has it shall <S%H3885>abide<s%> <S%H7649>satisfied;<s%> he shall not be <S%H6485>visited<s%> with <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

A <S%H6102>slothful<s%> man <S%H2934>hides<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> in his <S%H6747>bosom,<s%> and will not so <S%H1571>much<s%> as <S%H7725>bring<s%> it to his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

<S%H5221>Smite<s%> a <S%H3887>scorner,<s%> and the <S%H6612>simple<s%> will <S%H6191>beware:<s%> and <S%H3198>reprove<s%> one that has <S%H995>understanding,<s%> and he will <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>

He that <S%H7703>wastes<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H1272>chases<s%> away his <S%H517>mother,<s%> is a <S%H1121>son<s%> that causes <S%H954>shame,<s%> and <S%H2659>brings<s%> <S%H2659>reproach.<s%>
<S%H2308>Cease,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H4148>instruction<s%> that causes to <S%H7686>err<s%> from the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
An <S%H1100>ungodly<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H3887>scorns<s%> <S%H4941>judgment:<s%> and the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1104>devours<s%> <S%H205>iniquity.<s%>
<S%H8201>Judgments<s%> are <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for <S%H3887>scorners,<s%> and <S%H4112>stripes<s%> for the <S%H1458>back<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
